upload.list4: the latest version of all UAN records
upload.detail-text1: The CSV must have only two columns of data: UAN, followed by DOB in left to right order.
upload.warning: Importing a file will overwrite all existing records in this database.

what-next.heading: What happens next
what-next.para1: You will get a confirmation email once the import has happened. The email will tell you whether the import succeeded or failed.
what-next.para2: You can now close this page.
